title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When opening a Java editor in Photon, the expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. However, this is not happening as expected.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Observed Behavior (OB):
No popup menu is displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
EB:
Expected Behavior (EB):
A popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, and perform other relevant actions.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
